definitions.definition: An abugida script used to write many languages originating in India and Nepal , including Sanskrit , Hindi , Marathi , Kashmiri , Sindhi , Maithili , Bhili , Konkani , Bhojpuri , and Nepali .

main_definition: An abugida script used to write many languages originating in India and Nepal , including Sanskrit , Hindi , Marathi , Kashmiri , Sindhi , Maithili , Bhili , Konkani , Bhojpuri , and Nepali .
